result.eng: My money was leaving me fast.
result.ga: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mear
result.orig: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mear
result.html: Bhí mo chuid airgid ag imeacht uaim go mearMy money was leaving me fast.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mo ċuid airgid ag imeaċt uaim go mearMy money was leaving me fast.

result.html: Is maith liom caranna gastaI like fast cars.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom caranna gastaI like fast cars.

result.html: Labhraíonn sí go tapaShe talks fast.
result.ponchtml: Laḃraíonn sí go tapaShe talks fast.

result.eng: We were not fast enough, though.
result.ga: Ní raibh muid tapa go leor áfach
result.orig: Ní raibh muid tapa go leor áfach
result.html: Ní raibh muid tapa go leor áfachWe were not fast enough, though.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ muid tapa go leor áfaċWe were not fast enough, though.
